channel.title: Game Theory on union's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Game Theory on union's blog

item.title: Wardrop Equilibrium
item.description: I remember having those unpleasant lines in our high school canteen, flooded by the starving students queeing for their lunch, I would always pick a window with fewer people waiting, compromising myself with awful food. Another similar thought that always stricked me was the odds that tourists always pick the same time to travel, there’s almost always traffic congestion everywhere during holiday seasons. Yeah, lives have been always so hard.
